response.original_title: Massachusetts Avenue: Life Along Cambridge’s Main Artery
response.overview: A high-flying whirlwind grand tour of Mass. Ave. featuring stunning aerial cinematography, revealing interviews with small business owners, controversial news-making stories (the MIT and Harvard encampments), a look at the city’s political life and the Ave’s history, Central Square’s dance party as seen from above, more dance (!) , our local music scene and, of course, the turkeys.
response.tagline: “At its very worst, you will be mildly entertained.” - Federico Muchnik
response.title: Massachusetts Avenue: Life Along Cambridge’s Main Artery

release_dates.note: Special Premiere Screening at The Brattle Theatre in Cambridge, MA.
